pageContext.claim: “I called up the United States military. We're not playing games, folks. There's no games. Because you look at what's marching up [the migrant caravan], that's an invasion.”
pageContext.analysis: The military is {restricted by law} in the types of activities it can carry out on the border, and is forbidden from apprehending or searching migrants. Trump calls it an invasion, but many members of the caravan are women, children and asylum-seekers.
